song.title: I Want 8 Bits
song.info:
"Just for fun, I'm a bad singer! Atari ST + 1 synth + vocals. Here are the lyrics:
I want 8bits world, I want 8bits music, I want 8bits dance, because 8 bits is enough! I want 8bits cats, I want 8bits people, I want 8bits cars, because 8 bits is enough! Don't you love 8bits rhythm? Don't you love 8bits squares? Don't you love 8bits trackers? Don't you love 8bits dancers? I want 8bits flower, I want 8bits girls, I want 8bits kisses, because 8 bits is enough! I want 8bits emos, I want 8bits junkies, I want 8bits dealers, because 8 bits is enough!"
